title: strpos
c
can be understood as the number of bytes in the haystack before the first occurrence of the needle.

inline_content.Text: can be understood as the number of bytes in the haystack before the first occurrence of the needle.

title:
var_dump(strpos("haystack", "hay")); // int(0)
var_dump(strpos("haystack", "stack")); // int(3)
var_dump(strpos("haystack", "stackoverflow"); // bool(false)

content_resolved.code:
var_dump(strpos("haystack", "hay")); // int(0)
var_dump(strpos("haystack", "stack")); // int(3)
var_dump(strpos("haystack", "stackoverflow"); // bool(false)

title: Be careful with checking against TRUE or FALSE because if a index of 0 is returned an if statement will see this as FALSE.

inline_content.Text: Be careful with checking against TRUE or FALSE because if a index of 0 is returned an if statement will see this as FALSE.
